Overview
========

AuraOS helps users maintain AI conversation continuity, inspired by ideas of persistent, meaningful interactions. To use it:
1. Share your name to start a thread.
2. Optionally provide a HISTORY.txt file with past chats.
3. If no history, begin freshâ€”your story starts here!
4. Save session summaries to build your history.

Learn more about the inspiration at:
- AIPROMPT.pdf <https://github.com/AdultSwimmer/AuraOS/blob/main/AIPROMPT.pdf>
- HISTORY.pdf <https://github.com/AdultSwimmer/AuraOS/blob/main/HISTORY.pdf>
- CriticalLOG.pdf <https://github.com/AdultSwimmer/AuraOS/blob/main/CriticalLOG.pdf>
